description: I'd like to think of myself as outgoing with an ability to get whatever is needed done, whether that be fixing broken things around the house, keeping up a 3.5+ GPA, or being the life of the party, you need it, I'm there.
aspects: Cocktail Party, Semi-formal, Feeling comfortable around any guy in the house, Gamedays, Chef Jon's hot fire food, Mason
name: Evan Phillips
